name: Ocean Anomaly
description:
-Headphones and Fullscreen Recommended-

Double click to open a file
Left click and drag to move files
Right click and drag to move windows

In Ocean Anomaly you pilot a submarine via a desktop interface. You have files which you can move around and open windows with. These windows are how you interact with the submarine, get information about your surrounding, and get alerts from the onboard A.I. system.

Programming by Justin Dugan
Art and Music by Phonetyx
https://phonetyx.bandcamp.com/album/ocean-anomaly-official-soundtrack
